title: Prompt Technique Schema
description: Standardized enumeration of AI prompt engineering techniques used in The Shadow Team Chronicles production process.

descriptions.description: Detailed explanations of each prompt technique (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

zero_shot.description: Asking the AI to perform a task directly without examples, relying on its pre-trained knowledge.

few_shot.description: Providing the AI with a small number of examples demonstrating the desired output format or approach before asking it to generate similar content.

chain_of_thought.description: Prompting the AI to break down its reasoning process step-by-step, showing the logical progression from question to answer.

role_play.description: Instructing the AI to adopt a specific character, perspective, or professional role when generating content.

step_by_step.description: Guiding the AI through a sequential process where each step builds upon previous ones to develop comprehensive content.

iterative_revision.description: Repeatedly refining AI outputs through multiple rounds of feedback and specific improvement instructions.

system_prompt.description: Using specialized instructions that set global parameters for how the AI should behave throughout the entire interaction.

constrained_generation.description: Limiting AI outputs through specific rules, formats, word counts, or other technical boundaries.

knowledge_retrieval.description: Prompting the AI to recall and incorporate specific factual information from its training data or provided context.

critique_revision.description: Having the AI evaluate its own output and then make improvements based on that self-critique.

multi_agent.description: Creating simulated dialogue between different AI perspectives or specialties to explore multiple angles on a topic.

outline_expansion.description: Starting with a structured outline or skeleton that the AI progressively fills in with increasing detail.

tree_of_thought.description: Exploring multiple potential reasoning paths simultaneously and evaluating their respective merits to reach the best conclusion.

persona_driven.description: Creating a detailed character profile to guide how the AI responds, ensuring consistent voice and perspective.

schema_guided.description: Providing formal structures or JSON schemas that the AI must follow when generating its output.

consistency_reinforcement.description: Repeatedly reminding the AI about key facts, rules, or contexts to maintain coherence across a longer generation.

narrative_framing.description: Establishing a clear storytelling context or narrative perspective before requesting content generation.

expertize_emulation.description: Instructing the AI to generate content at a specific knowledge or skill level appropriate for the target audience.

style_mimicking.description: Providing examples of a particular writing style, tone, or author's voice for the AI to emulate in its generation.

dialogue_based.description: Formulating prompts as natural conversation to elicit more nuanced or creative responses from the AI.
